name: Scooter FE3D 2 - Freestyle Extreme 3D
description:
Grab your scooter and get ready to shred! There are so many things to do in this free scooter game!

- Ride your scooter and do tons of different tricks!
- Create your own skate parks to ride in!
- Customize your character and your scooter!
- Earn skill points to level up your character!
- 3 different game modes, Arcade, S-C-O-O-T and Free Mode!
- All while listening to music from great artists and bands!

Feel like a pro freestyle scooter rider in this scooter simulator game, while you are skating the skate parks, doing awesome and extreme stunts and tricks, wheelies, wallrides, flips and grinds! Ride ramps, ride streets, ride anything!

Pick one of the 3 game modes, Arcade mode, where you score as many points as you can in 3 minutes, S-C-O-O-T, where you have to do specific tricks to win, or Free Mode where you can skate around with no time limits or interruptions and just have fun!

Customize your character with tons of different shoes, shirts, hats, accessories and more, customize your scooter with different parts and paint it any way you want to!

You can even create your own maps and ride them!

So what are you waiting for? Get it and go shred it!

The game is developed by independent developer EnJen Games. Follow EnJen Games on www.facebook.com/EnJenGames, to request new features, report bugs, or get the latest news about new EnJen Games or updates!
